sense.def:
To recruit people for an organization
pomeni prepričati ljudi, da se vključijo v neko organizacijo ali delajo zanjo.

seg.quote: I am recruiting for the Union.
Other organizations reported sharp rises in recruiting.

sense.def:
A recruit
je človek, ki je pred kratkim vstopil v organizacijo ali vojsko.

seg.quote: He joined the firm as a young recruit more than thirty years ago.

sense.def:
To recruit someone for a particular purpose
pomeni pridobiti človeka, da naredi nekaj za nas.

seg.quote: Men from the villages were recruited to carry stores.
